204  static bool HandleSkirmishCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
205  {
206  Tokenizer tokens(args, ' ');
207 
208  if (!*args || !tokens.size())
209  {
210  handler->PSendSysMessage("Usage: .skirmish [arena] [XvX] [Nick1] [Nick2] ... [NickN]");
211  handler->PSendSysMessage("[arena] can be \"all\" or comma-separated list of possible arenas (NA,BE,RL,DS,RV).");
212  handler->PSendSysMessage("[XvX] can be 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, 5v5. After [XvX] specify enough nicknames for that mode.");
213  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
214  return false;
215  }
216 
217  Tokenizer::const_iterator tokensItr = tokens.begin();
218 
219  std::set<BattlegroundTypeId> allowedArenas;
220  std::string arenasStr = *(tokensItr++);
221  std::string tmpStr;
222  Tokenizer arenaTokens(arenasStr, ',');
223  for (Tokenizer::const_iterator itr = arenaTokens.begin(); itr != arenaTokens.end(); ++itr)
224  {
225  tmpStr = std::string(*itr);
226  if (tmpStr == "all")
227  {
228  if (arenaTokens.size() > 1)
229  {
230  handler->PSendSysMessage("Invalid [arena] specified.");
231  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
232  return false;
233  }
234  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_NA);
235  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_BE);
236  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_RL);
237  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_DS);
238  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_RV);
239  }
240  else if (tmpStr == "NA")
241  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_NA);
242  else if (tmpStr == "BE")
243  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_BE);
244  else if (tmpStr == "RL")
245  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_RL);
246  else if (tmpStr == "DS")
247  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_DS);
248  else if (tmpStr == "RV")
249  allowedArenas.insert(BATTLEGROUND_RV);
250  else
251  {
252  handler->PSendSysMessage("Invalid [arena] specified.");
253  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
254  return false;
255  }
256  }
257  ASSERT(!allowedArenas.empty());
258  BattlegroundTypeId randomizedArenaBgTypeId = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(allowedArenas);
259 
260  uint8 count = 0;
261  if (tokensItr != tokens.end())
262  {
263  std::string mode = *(tokensItr++);
264  if (mode == "1v1") count = 2;
265  else if (mode == "2v2") count = 4;
266  else if (mode == "3v3") count = 6;
267  else if (mode == "5v5") count = 10;
268  }
269 
270  if (!count)
271  {
272  handler->PSendSysMessage("Invalid bracket. Can be 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, 5v5");
273  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
274  return false;
275  }
276 
277  if (tokens.size() != uint16(count + 2))
278  {
279  handler->PSendSysMessage("Invalid number of nicknames for this bracket.");
280  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
281  return false;
282  }
283 
284  uint8 hcnt = count / 2;
285  uint8 error = 0;
286  std::string last_name;
287  Player* plr = nullptr;
288  Player* players[10] = {nullptr};
289  uint8 cnt = 0;
290  for (; tokensItr != tokens.end(); ++tokensItr)
291  {
292  last_name = std::string(*tokensItr);
293  plr = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayerByName(last_name, false);
294  if (!plr) { error = 1; break; }
295  if (!plr->IsInWorld() || !plr->FindMap() || plr->IsBeingTeleported()) { error = 2; break; }
296  if (plr->GetMap()->GetEntry()->Instanceable()) { error = 3; break; }
297  if (plr->isUsingLfg()) { error = 4; break; }
298  if (plr->InBattlegroundQueue()) { error = 5; break; }
299  if (plr->IsInFlight()) { error = 10; break; }
300  if (!plr->IsAlive()) { error = 11; break; }
301  const Group* g = plr->GetGroup();
302  if (hcnt > 1)
303  {
304  if (!g) { error = 6; break; }
305  if (g->isRaidGroup() || g->isBGGroup() || g->isBFGroup() || g->isLFGGroup()) { error = 7; break; }
306  if (g->GetMembersCount() != hcnt) { error = 8; break; }
307 
308  uint8 sti = (cnt < hcnt ? 0 : hcnt);
309  if (sti != cnt)
310  if (players[sti]->GetGroup() != plr->GetGroup()) { error = 9; last_name += " and " + players[sti]->GetName(); break; }
311  }
312  else // 1v1
313  {
314  if (g) { error = 12; break; }
315  }
316  players[cnt++] = plr;
317  }
318 
319  for (uint8 i = 0; i < cnt && !error; ++i)
320  {
321  for (uint8 j = i + 1; j < cnt; ++j)
322  {
323  if (players[i]->GetGUID() == players[j]->GetGUID())
324  {
325  last_name = players[i]->GetName();
326  error = 13;
327  break;
328  }
329  }
330  }
331 
332  switch (error)
333  {
334  case 1:
335  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s not found.", last_name.c_str());
336  break;
337  case 2:
338  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s is being teleported.", last_name.c_str());
339  break;
340  case 3:
341  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s is in instance/battleground/arena.", last_name.c_str());
342  break;
343  case 4:
344  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s is in LFG system.", last_name.c_str());
345  break;
346  case 5:
347  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s is queued for battleground/arena.", last_name.c_str());
348  break;
349  case 6:
350  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s is not in group.", last_name.c_str());
351  break;
352  case 7:
353  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s is not in normal group.", last_name.c_str());
354  break;
355  case 8:
356  handler->PSendSysMessage("Group of player %s has invalid member count.", last_name.c_str());
357  break;
358  case 9:
359  handler->PSendSysMessage("Players %s are not in the same group.", last_name.c_str());
360  break;
361  case 10:
362  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s is in flight.", last_name.c_str());
363  break;
364  case 11:
365  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s is dead.", last_name.c_str());
366  break;
367  case 12:
368  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s is in a group.", last_name.c_str());
369  break;
370  case 13:
371  handler->PSendSysMessage("Player %s occurs more than once.", last_name.c_str());
372  break;
373  }
374 
375  if (error)
376  {
377  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
378  return false;
379  }
380 
381  Battleground* bgt = sBattlegroundMgr->GetBattlegroundTemplate(BATTLEGROUND_AA);
382  if (!bgt)
383  {
384  handler->PSendSysMessage("Couldn't create arena map!");
385  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
386  return false;
387  }
388 
389  Battleground* bg = sBattlegroundMgr->CreateNewBattleground(randomizedArenaBgTypeId, 80, 80, ArenaType(hcnt >= 2 ? hcnt : 2), false);
390  if (!bg)
391  {
392  handler->PSendSysMessage("Couldn't create arena map!");
393  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
394  return false;
395  }
396 
397  bg->StartBattleground();
398 
399  BattlegroundTypeId bgTypeId = bg->GetBgTypeID();
400 
401  TeamId teamId1 = Player::TeamIdForRace(players[0]->getRace());
402  TeamId teamId2 = (teamId1 == TEAM_ALLIANCE ? TEAM_HORDE : TEAM_ALLIANCE);
403  for (uint8 i = 0; i < cnt; ++i)
404  {
405  Player* player = players[i];
406 
407  TeamId teamId = (i < hcnt ? teamId1 : teamId2);
408  player->SetEntryPoint();
409 
410  uint32 queueSlot = 0;
411  WorldPacket data;
412  sBattlegroundMgr->BuildBattlegroundStatusPacket(&data, bg, queueSlot, STATUS_IN_PROGRESS, 0, bg->GetStartTime(), bg->GetArenaType(), teamId);
413  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
414 
415  player->SetBattlegroundId(bg->GetInstanceID(), bgTypeId, queueSlot, true, false, teamId);
416  sBattlegroundMgr->SendToBattleground(player, bg->GetInstanceID(), bgTypeId);
417  }
418 
419  handler->PSendSysMessage("Success! Players are now being teleported to the arena.");
420  return true;
421  }
422 
423  static bool HandleDevCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* enable)
424  {
425  Player* player = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer();
426 
427  if (!*enable)
428  {
429  handler->GetSession()->SendNotification(player->IsDeveloper() ? LANG_DEV_ON : LANG_DEV_OFF);
430  return true;
431  }
432 
433  std::string enablestr = (char*)enable;
434 
435  if (enablestr == "on")
436  {
437  player->SetDeveloper(true);
438  handler->GetSession()->SendNotification(LANG_DEV_ON);
439  sScriptMgr->OnHandleDevCommand(handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer(), enablestr);
440  return true;
441  }
442  else if (enablestr == "off")
443  {
444  player->SetDeveloper(false);
445  handler->GetSession()->SendNotification(LANG_DEV_OFF);
446  sScriptMgr->OnHandleDevCommand(handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer(), enablestr);
447  return true;
448  }
449 
450  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_USE_BOL);
451  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
452  return false;
453  }
454 
455  static bool HandleGPSCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
456  {
457  WorldObject* object = nullptr;
458  if (*args)
459  {
460  HighGuid guidHigh;
461  ObjectGuid::LowType guidLow = handler->extractLowGuidFromLink((char*)args, guidHigh);
462  if (!guidLow)
463  return false;
464 
465  switch (guidHigh)
466  {
467  case HighGuid::Player:
468  {
469  object = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayerByLowGUID(guidLow);
470  if (!object)
471  {
472  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
473  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
474  }
475  break;
476  }
477  case HighGuid::Unit:
478  {
479  object = handler->GetCreatureFromPlayerMapByDbGuid(guidLow);
480  if (!object)
481  {
482  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOCREATUREFOUND);
483  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
484  }
485  break;
486  }
487  case HighGuid::GameObject:
488  {
489  object = handler->GetObjectFromPlayerMapByDbGuid(guidLow);
490  if (!object)
491  {
492  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOGAMEOBJECTFOUND);
493  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
494  }
495  break;
496  }
497  default:
498  return false;
499  }
500  if (!object)
501  return false;
502  }
503  else
504  {
505  object = handler->getSelectedUnit();
506 
507  if (!object)
508  {
509  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
510  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
511  return false;
512  }
513  }
514 
515  CellCoord cellCoord = Acore::ComputeCellCoord(object->GetPositionX(), object->GetPositionY());
516  Cell cell(cellCoord);
517 
518  uint32 zoneId, areaId;
519  object->GetZoneAndAreaId(zoneId, areaId);
520 
521  MapEntry const* mapEntry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(object->GetMapId());
522  AreaTableEntry const* zoneEntry = sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(zoneId);
523  AreaTableEntry const* areaEntry = sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(areaId);
524 
525  float zoneX = object->GetPositionX();
526  float zoneY = object->GetPositionY();
527 
528  Map2ZoneCoordinates(zoneX, zoneY, zoneId);
529 
530  float groundZ = object->GetMapHeight(object->GetPositionX(), object->GetPositionY(), MAX_HEIGHT);
531  float floorZ = object->GetMapHeight(object->GetPositionX(), object->GetPositionY(), object->GetPositionZ());
532 
533  GridCoord gridCoord = Acore::ComputeGridCoord(object->GetPositionX(), object->GetPositionY());
534 
535  // 63? WHY?
536  int gridX = 63 - gridCoord.x_coord;
537  int gridY = 63 - gridCoord.y_coord;
538 
539  uint32 haveMap = Map::ExistMap(object->GetMapId(), gridX, gridY) ? 1 : 0;
540  uint32 haveVMap = Map::ExistVMap(object->GetMapId(), gridX, gridY) ? 1 : 0;
541  uint32 haveMMAP = MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapMgr()->GetNavMesh(handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetMapId()) ? 1 : 0;
542 
543  if (haveVMap)
544  {
545  if (object->IsOutdoors())
546  handler->PSendSysMessage("You are outdoors");
547  else
548  handler->PSendSysMessage("You are indoors");
549  }
550  else
551  handler->PSendSysMessage("no VMAP available for area info");
552 
553  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MAP_POSITION,
554  object->GetMapId(), (mapEntry ? mapEntry->name[handler->GetSessionDbcLocale()] : "<unknown>"),
555  zoneId, (zoneEntry ? zoneEntry->area_name[handler->GetSessionDbcLocale()] : "<unknown>"),
556  areaId, (areaEntry ? areaEntry->area_name[handler->GetSessionDbcLocale()] : "<unknown>"),
557  object->GetPhaseMask(),
558  object->GetPositionX(), object->GetPositionY(), object->GetPositionZ(), object->GetOrientation(),
559  cell.GridX(), cell.GridY(), cell.CellX(), cell.CellY(), object->GetInstanceId(),
560  zoneX, zoneY, groundZ, floorZ, haveMap, haveVMap, haveMMAP);
561 
562  LiquidData const& liquidData = object->GetLiquidData();
563 
564  if (liquidData.Status)
565  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_LIQUID_STATUS, liquidData.Level, liquidData.DepthLevel, liquidData.Entry, liquidData.Flags, liquidData.Status);
566 
567  if (object->GetTransport())
568  handler->PSendSysMessage("Transport offset: %.2f, %.2f, %.2f, %.2f", object->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.GetPositionX(), object->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.GetPositionY(), object->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.GetPositionZ(), object->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.GetOrientation());
569 
570  return true;
571  }
572 
573  static bool HandleAuraCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
574  {
575  Unit* target = handler->getSelectedUnit();
576  if (!target)
577  {
578  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
579  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
580  return false;
581  }
582 
583  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
584  uint32 spellId = handler->extractSpellIdFromLink((char*)args);
585  if (!spellId)
586  return false;
587 
588  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spellId);
589  if (!spellInfo)
590  {
591  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOSPELLFOUND);
592  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
593  return false;
594  }
595 
596  if (!SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo))
597  {
598  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_SPELL_BROKEN, spellId);
599  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
600  return false;
601  }
602 
603  Aura::TryRefreshStackOrCreate(spellInfo, MAX_EFFECT_MASK, target, target);
604 
605  return true;
606  }
607 
608  static bool HandleUnAuraCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
609  {
610  Unit* target = handler->getSelectedUnit();
611  if (!target)
612  {
613  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
614  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
615  return false;
616  }
617 
618  std::string argstr = args;
619  if (argstr == "all")
620  {
621  target->RemoveAllAuras();
622  return true;
623  }
624 
625  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
626  uint32 spellId = handler->extractSpellIdFromLink((char*)args);
627  if (!spellId)
628  return false;
629 
630  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId);
631 
632  return true;
633  }
634  // Teleport to Player
635  static bool HandleAppearCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
636  {
637  Player* target;
638  ObjectGuid targetGuid;
639  std::string targetName;
640  if (!handler->extractPlayerTarget((char*)args, &target, &targetGuid, &targetName))
641  return false;
642 
643  Player* _player = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer();
644  if (target == _player || targetGuid == _player->GetGUID())
645  {
646  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_CANT_TELEPORT_SELF);
647  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
648  return false;
649  }
650 
651  if (target)
652  {
653  // check online security
654  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(target))
655  return false;
656 
657  std::string chrNameLink = handler->playerLink(targetName);
658 
659  Map* map = target->GetMap();
660  if (map->IsBattlegroundOrArena())
661  {
662  // only allow if gm mode is on
663  if (!_player->IsGameMaster())
664  {
665  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_CANNOT_GO_TO_BG_GM, chrNameLink.c_str());
666  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
667  return false;
668  }
669 
670  if (!_player->GetMap()->IsBattlegroundOrArena())
671  _player->SetEntryPoint();
672 
673  _player->SetBattlegroundId(target->GetBattlegroundId(), target->GetBattlegroundTypeId(), PLAYER_MAX_BATTLEGROUND_QUEUES, false, false, TEAM_NEUTRAL);
674  }
675  else if (map->IsDungeon())
676  {
677  // we have to go to instance, and can go to player only if:
678  // 1) we are in his group (either as leader or as member)
679  // 2) we are not bound to any group and have GM mode on
680  if (_player->GetGroup())
681  {
682  // we are in group, we can go only if we are in the player group
683  if (_player->GetGroup() != target->GetGroup())
684  {
685  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_CANNOT_GO_TO_INST_PARTY, chrNameLink.c_str());
686  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
687  return false;
688  }
689  }
690  else
691  {
692  // we are not in group, let's verify our GM mode
693  if (!_player->IsGameMaster())
694  {
695  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_CANNOT_GO_TO_INST_GM, chrNameLink.c_str());
696  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
697  return false;
698  }
699  }
700 
701  // if the GM is bound to another instance, he will not be bound to another one
702  InstancePlayerBind* bind = sInstanceSaveMgr->PlayerGetBoundInstance(_player->GetGUID(), target->GetMapId(), target->GetDifficulty(map->IsRaid()));
703  if (!bind)
704  if (InstanceSave* save = sInstanceSaveMgr->GetInstanceSave(target->GetInstanceId()))
705  sInstanceSaveMgr->PlayerBindToInstance(_player->GetGUID(), save, !save->CanReset(), _player);
706 
707  if (map->IsRaid())
708  _player->SetRaidDifficulty(target->GetRaidDifficulty());
709  else
710  _player->SetDungeonDifficulty(target->GetDungeonDifficulty());
711  }
712 
713  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_APPEARING_AT, chrNameLink.c_str());
714 
715  // stop flight if need
716  if (_player->IsInFlight())
717  {
718  _player->GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
719  _player->CleanupAfterTaxiFlight();
720  }
721  // save only in non-flight case
722  else
723  _player->SaveRecallPosition();
724 
725  if (_player->TeleportTo(target->GetMapId(), target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ() + 0.25f, _player->GetOrientation(), TELE_TO_GM_MODE, target))
726  _player->SetPhaseMask(target->GetPhaseMask() | 1, false);
727  }
728  else
729  {
730  // check offline security
731  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(nullptr, targetGuid))
732  return false;
733 
734  std::string nameLink = handler->playerLink(targetName);
735 
736  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_APPEARING_AT, nameLink.c_str());
737 
738  // to point where player stay (if loaded)
739  float x, y, z, o;
740  uint32 map;
741  bool in_flight;
742  if (!Player::LoadPositionFromDB(map, x, y, z, o, in_flight, targetGuid.GetCounter()))
743  return false;
744 
745  // stop flight if need
746  if (_player->IsInFlight())
747  {
748  _player->GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
749  _player->CleanupAfterTaxiFlight();
750  }
751  // save only in non-flight case
752  else
753  _player->SaveRecallPosition();
754 
755  _player->TeleportTo(map, x, y, z, _player->GetOrientation());
756  }
757 
758  return true;
759  }
760  // Summon Player
761  static bool HandleSummonCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
762  {
763  Player* target;
764  ObjectGuid targetGuid;
765  std::string targetName;
766  if (!handler->extractPlayerTarget((char*)args, &target, &targetGuid, &targetName))
767  return false;
768 
769  Player* _player = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer();
770  if (target == _player || targetGuid == _player->GetGUID())
771  {
772  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_CANT_TELEPORT_SELF);
773  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
774  return false;
775  }
776 
777  if (target)
778  {
779  std::string nameLink = handler->playerLink(targetName);
780  // check online security
781  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(target))
782  return false;
783 
784  if (target->IsBeingTeleported())
785  {
786  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_IS_TELEPORTED, nameLink.c_str());
787  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
788  return false;
789  }
790 
791  Map* map = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetMap();
792 
793  if (map->IsBattlegroundOrArena())
794  {
795  handler->PSendSysMessage("Can't summon to a battleground!");
796  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
797  return false;
798  }
799  else if (map->IsDungeon())
800  {
801  // Allow GM to summon players or only other GM accounts inside instances.
802  if (!sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_INSTANCE_GMSUMMON_PLAYER))
803  {
804  // pussywizard: prevent unbinding normal player's perm bind by just summoning him >_>
805  if (!target->GetSession()->GetSecurity())
806  {
807  handler->PSendSysMessage("Only GMs can be summoned to an instance!");
808  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
809  return false;
810  }
811  }
812 
813  Map* destMap = target->GetMap();
814 
815  if (destMap->Instanceable() && destMap->GetInstanceId() != map->GetInstanceId())
816  sInstanceSaveMgr->PlayerUnbindInstance(target->GetGUID(), map->GetInstanceId(), target->GetDungeonDifficulty(), true, target);
817 
818  // we are in an instance, and can only summon players in our group with us as leader
819  if (!handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGroup() || !target->GetGroup() ||
820  (target->GetGroup()->GetLeaderGUID() != handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGUID()) ||
821  (handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGroup()->GetLeaderGUID() != handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGUID()))
822  // the last check is a bit excessive, but let it be, just in case
823  {
824  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_CANNOT_SUMMON_TO_INST, nameLink.c_str());
825  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
826  return false;
827  }
828  }
829 
830  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_SUMMONING, nameLink.c_str(), "");
831  if (handler->needReportToTarget(target))
832  ChatHandler(target->GetSession()).PSendSysMessage(LANG_SUMMONED_BY, handler->playerLink(_player->GetName()).c_str());
833 
834  // stop flight if need
835  if (target->IsInFlight())
836  {
837  target->GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
838  target->CleanupAfterTaxiFlight();
839  }
840  // save only in non-flight case
841  else
842  target->SaveRecallPosition();
843 
844  // before GM
845  float x, y, z;
846  handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, target->GetObjectSize());
847  target->TeleportTo(handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetMapId(), x, y, z, target->GetOrientation(), 0, handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer());
848  }
849  else
850  {
851  // check offline security
852  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(nullptr, targetGuid))
853  return false;
854 
855  std::string nameLink = handler->playerLink(targetName);
856 
857  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_SUMMONING, nameLink.c_str(), handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_OFFLINE));
858 
859  // in point where GM stay
860  Player::SavePositionInDB(handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetMapId(),
861  handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetPositionX(),
862  handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetPositionY(),
863  handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetPositionZ(),
864  handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetOrientation(),
865  handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetZoneId(),
866  targetGuid);
867  }
868 
869  return true;
870  }
871  // Summon group of player
872  static bool HandleGroupSummonCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
873  {
874  Player* target;
875  if (!handler->extractPlayerTarget((char*)args, &target))
876  return false;
877 
878  // check online security
879  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(target))
880  return false;
881 
882  Group* group = target->GetGroup();
883 
884  std::string nameLink = handler->GetNameLink(target);
885 
886  if (!group)
887  {
888  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_NOT_IN_GROUP, nameLink.c_str());
889  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
890  return false;
891  }
892 
893  Map* gmMap = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetMap();
894  bool toInstance = gmMap->Instanceable();
895 
896  // we are in instance, and can summon only player in our group with us as lead
897  if (toInstance && (
898  !handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGroup() || (group->GetLeaderGUID() != handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGUID()) ||
899  (handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGroup()->GetLeaderGUID() != handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGUID())))
900  // the last check is a bit excessive, but let it be, just in case
901  {
902  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_CANNOT_SUMMON_TO_INST);
903  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
904  return false;
905  }
906 
907  for (GroupReference* itr = group->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
908  {
909  Player* player = itr->GetSource();
910 
911  if (!player || player == handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer() || !player->GetSession())
912  continue;
913 
914  // check online security
915  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(player))
916  return false;
917 
918  std::string plNameLink = handler->GetNameLink(player);
919 
920  if (player->IsBeingTeleported())
921  {
922  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_IS_TELEPORTED, plNameLink.c_str());
923  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
924  return false;
925  }
926 
927  if (toInstance)
928  {
929  Map* playerMap = player->GetMap();
930 
931  if (playerMap->Instanceable() && playerMap->GetInstanceId() != gmMap->GetInstanceId())
932  {
933  // cannot summon from instance to instance
934  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_CANNOT_SUMMON_TO_INST, plNameLink.c_str());
935  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
936  return false;
937  }
938  }
939 
940  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_SUMMONING, plNameLink.c_str(), "");
941  if (handler->needReportToTarget(player))
942  ChatHandler(player->GetSession()).PSendSysMessage(LANG_SUMMONED_BY, handler->GetNameLink().c_str());
943 
944  // stop flight if need
945  if (player->IsInFlight())
946  {
947  player->GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
948  player->CleanupAfterTaxiFlight();
949  }
950  // save only in non-flight case
951  else
952  player->SaveRecallPosition();
953 
954  // before GM
955  float x, y, z;
956  handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, player->GetObjectSize());
957  player->TeleportTo(handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetMapId(), x, y, z, player->GetOrientation(), 0, handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer());
958  }
959 
960  return true;
961  }

965  SendCommandHelpFor(*handler, "");
966  return true;

969  static bool HandleDieCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* /*args*/)
970  {
971  Unit* target = handler->getSelectedUnit();
972 
973  if (!target || !handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetTarget())
974  {
975  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
976  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
977  return false;
978  }
979 
980  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
981  {
982  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(target->ToPlayer()))
983  return false;
984  }
985 
986  if (target->IsAlive())
987  {
988  if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_DIE_COMMAND_MODE))
989  {
990  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && handler->GetSession()->GetSecurity() == SEC_CONSOLE) // pussywizard
991  target->ToCreature()->LowerPlayerDamageReq(target->GetMaxHealth());
992  Unit::Kill(handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer(), target);
993  }
994  else
995  Unit::DealDamage(handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer(), target, target->GetHealth(), nullptr, DIRECT_DAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false, true);
996  }
997 
998  return true;
999  }

1001  static bool HandleReviveCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1002  {
1003  Player* target;
1004  ObjectGuid targetGuid;

1006  return false;

1008  if (target)

1010  target->ResurrectPlayer(!AccountMgr::IsPlayerAccount(target->GetSession()->GetSecurity()) ? 1.0f : 0.5f);
1011  target->SpawnCorpseBones();
1012  target->SaveToDB(false, false);
1013  }
1014  else
1015  {
1016  CharacterDatabaseTransaction trans(nullptr);
1017  Player::OfflineResurrect(targetGuid, trans);
1018  }
1019 
1020  return true;
1021  }

1046  return true;

1064  static bool HandleHelpCommand(ChatHandler* handler, Tail cmd)

1073  // move item to other slot
1074  static bool HandleItemMoveCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1075  {
1076  if (!*args)
1077  return false;
1078 
1079  char const* param1 = strtok((char*)args, " ");
1080  if (!param1)
1081  return false;
1082 
1083  char const* param2 = strtok(nullptr, " ");
1084  if (!param2)
1085  return false;
1086 
1087  uint8 srcSlot = uint8(atoi(param1));
1088  uint8 dstSlot = uint8(atoi(param2));
1089 
1090  if (srcSlot == dstSlot)
1091  return true;
1092 
1093  if (!handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->IsValidPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, srcSlot, true))
1094  return false;
1095 
1096  if (!handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->IsValidPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, dstSlot, false))
1097  return false;
1098 
1099  uint16 src = ((INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0 << 8) | srcSlot);
1100  uint16 dst = ((INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0 << 8) | dstSlot);
1101 
1102  handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->SwapItem(src, dst);
1103 
1104  return true;
1105  }
1106 
1107  static bool HandleCooldownCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1108  {
1109  Player* target = handler->getSelectedPlayer();
1110  if (!target)
1111  {
1112  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
1113  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1114  return false;
1115  }
1116 
1117  std::string nameLink = handler->GetNameLink(target);
1118 
1119  if (!*args)
1120  {
1121  target->RemoveAllSpellCooldown();
1122  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVEALL_COOLDOWN, nameLink.c_str());
1123  }
1124  else
1125  {
1126  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hspell:spell_id|h[name]|h|r or Htalent form
1127  uint32 spellIid = handler->extractSpellIdFromLink((char*)args);
1128  if (!spellIid)
1129  return false;
1130 
1131  if (!sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spellIid))
1132  {
1133  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_UNKNOWN_SPELL, target == handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer() ? handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_YOU) : nameLink.c_str());
1134  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1135  return false;
1136  }
1137 
1138  target->RemoveSpellCooldown(spellIid, true);
1139  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVE_COOLDOWN, spellIid, target == handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer() ? handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_YOU) : nameLink.c_str());
1140  }
1141  return true;
1142  }

1144  static bool HandleGetDistanceCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1145  {
1146  WorldObject* obj = nullptr;
1147  if (*args)
1148  {
1149  HighGuid guidHigh;
1150  ObjectGuid::LowType guidLow = handler->extractLowGuidFromLink((char*)args, guidHigh);
1151  if (!guidLow)
1152  return false;
1153 
1154  switch (guidHigh)
1155  {
1156  case HighGuid::Player:
1157  {
1158  obj = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayerByLowGUID(guidLow);
1159  if (!obj)
1160  {
1161  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
1162  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1163  }
1164  break;
1165  }
1166  case HighGuid::Unit:
1167  {
1168  obj = handler->GetCreatureFromPlayerMapByDbGuid(guidLow);
1169  if (!obj)
1170  {
1171  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOCREATUREFOUND);
1172  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1173  }
1174  break;
1175  }
1176  case HighGuid::GameObject:
1177  {
1178  obj = handler->GetObjectFromPlayerMapByDbGuid(guidLow);
1179  if (!obj)
1180  {
1181  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOGAMEOBJECTFOUND);
1182  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1183  }
1184  break;
1185  }
1186  default:
1187  return false;
1188  }
1189  if (!obj)
1190  return false;
1191  }
1192  else
1193  {
1194  obj = handler->getSelectedUnit();
1195 
1196  if (!obj)
1197  {
1198  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
1199  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1200  return false;
1201  }
1202  }
1203 
1204  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_DISTANCE, handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetDistance(obj), handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetDistance2d(obj), handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetExactDist(obj), handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetExactDist2d(obj));
1205  return true;
1206  }
1207  // Teleport player to last position
1208  static bool HandleRecallCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1209  {
1210  Player* target;
1211  if (!handler->extractPlayerTarget((char*)args, &target))
1212  return false;
1213 
1214  // check online security
1215  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(target))
1216  return false;
1217 
1218  if (target->IsBeingTeleported())
1219  {
1220  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_IS_TELEPORTED, handler->GetNameLink(target).c_str());
1221  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1222  return false;
1223  }
1224 
1225  // stop flight if need
1226  if (target->IsInFlight())
1227  {
1228  target->GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
1229  target->CleanupAfterTaxiFlight();
1230  }
1231 
1232  target->TeleportTo(target->m_recallMap, target->m_recallX, target->m_recallY, target->m_recallZ, target->m_recallO);
1233  return true;
1234  }

1236  static bool HandleSaveCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* /*args*/)
1237  {
1238  Player* player = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer();
1239 
1240  // save GM account without delay and output message
1241  if (handler->GetSession()->GetSecurity() >= SEC_GAMEMASTER)
1242  {
1243  if (Player* target = handler->getSelectedPlayer())
1244  {
1245  target->SaveToDB(false, false);
1246  }
1247  else
1248  {
1249  player->SaveToDB(false, false);
1250  }
1251  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_SAVED);
1252  return true;
1253  }
1254 
1255  // save if the player has last been saved over 20 seconds ago
1256  uint32 saveInterval = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_SAVE);
1257  if (saveInterval == 0 || (saveInterval > 20 * IN_MILLISECONDS && player->GetSaveTimer() <= saveInterval - 20 * IN_MILLISECONDS))
1258  {
1259  player->SaveToDB(false, false);
1260  }
1261 
1262  return true;
1263  }

1486  static bool HandleShowAreaCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)

1495  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1496  return false;
1497  }

1500  if (!area)

1504  return false;

1512  return false;
1513  }

1516  uint32 currFields = playerTarget->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_1 + offset);
1517  playerTarget->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_EXPLORED_ZONES_1 + offset, uint32((currFields | val)));
1518 
1519  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_EXPLORE_AREA);
1520  return true;
1521  }

1560  static bool HandleAddItemCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1561  {
1562  if (!*args)
1563  return false;
1564 
1565  uint32 itemId = 0;
1566 
1567  if (args[0] == '[') // [name] manual form
1568  {
1569  char const* itemNameStr = strtok((char*)args, "]");
1570 
1571  if (itemNameStr && itemNameStr[0])
1572  {
1573  std::string itemName = itemNameStr + 1;
1574 
1575  WorldDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_SEL_ITEM_TEMPLATE_BY_NAME);
1576  stmt->setString(0, itemName);
1577  PreparedQueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query(stmt);
1578 
1579  if (!result)
1580  {
1581  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_COULDNOTFIND, itemNameStr + 1);
1582  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1583  return false;
1584  }
1585  itemId = result->Fetch()->GetUInt32();
1586  }
1587  else
1588  return false;
1589  }
1590  else // item_id or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hitem:item_id:0:0:0|h[name]|h|r
1591  {
1592  char const* id = handler->extractKeyFromLink((char*)args, "Hitem");
1593  if (!id)
1594  return false;
1595  itemId = uint32(atol(id));
1596  }
1597 
1598  char const* ccount = strtok(nullptr, " ");
1599 
1600  int32 count = 1;
1601 
1602  if (ccount)
1603  count = strtol(ccount, nullptr, 10);
1604 
1605  if (count == 0)
1606  count = 1;
1607 
1608  Player* player = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer();
1609  Player* playerTarget = handler->getSelectedPlayer();
1610  if (!playerTarget)
1611  playerTarget = player;
1612 
1613  ItemTemplate const* itemTemplate = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(itemId);
1614  if (!itemTemplate)
1615  {
1616  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ITEMIDINVALID, itemId);
1617  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1618  return false;
1619  }
1620 
1621  // Subtract
1622  if (count < 0)
1623  {
1624  // Only have scam check on player accounts
1625  if (playerTarget->GetSession()->GetSecurity() == SEC_PLAYER)
1626  {
1627  if (!playerTarget->HasItemCount(itemId, 0))
1628  {
1629  // output that player don't have any items to destroy
1630  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVEITEM_FAILURE, handler->GetNameLink(playerTarget).c_str(), itemId);
1631  }
1632  else if (!playerTarget->HasItemCount(itemId, -count))
1633  {
1634  // output that player don't have as many items that you want to destroy
1635  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVEITEM_ERROR, handler->GetNameLink(playerTarget).c_str(), itemId);
1636  }
1637  }
1638  else
1639  {
1640  // output successful amount of destroyed items
1641  playerTarget->DestroyItemCount(itemId, -count, true, false);
1642  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_REMOVEITEM, itemId, -count, handler->GetNameLink(playerTarget).c_str());
1643  }
1644 
1645  return true;
1646  }
1647 
1648  // Adding items
1649  uint32 noSpaceForCount = 0;
1650 
1651  // check space and find places
1652  ItemPosCountVec dest;
1653  InventoryResult msg = playerTarget->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, itemId, count, &noSpaceForCount);
1654  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK) // convert to possible store amount
1655  count -= noSpaceForCount;
1656 
1657  if (count == 0 || dest.empty()) // can't add any
1658  {
1659  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_CANNOT_CREATE, itemId, noSpaceForCount);
1660  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1661  return false;
1662  }
1663 
1664  Item* item = playerTarget->StoreNewItem(dest, itemId, true);
1665 
1666  // remove binding (let GM give it to another player later)
1667  if (player == playerTarget)
1668  for (ItemPosCountVec::const_iterator itr = dest.begin(); itr != dest.end(); ++itr)
1669  if (Item* item1 = player->GetItemByPos(itr->pos))
1670  item1->SetBinding(false);
1671 
1672  if (count > 0 && item)
1673  {
1674  player->SendNewItem(item, count, false, true);
1675  if (player != playerTarget)
1676  playerTarget->SendNewItem(item, count, true, false);
1677  }
1678 
1679  if (noSpaceForCount > 0)
1680  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_CANNOT_CREATE, itemId, noSpaceForCount);
1681 
1682  return true;
1683  }
1684 
1685  static bool HandleAddItemSetCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1686  {
1687  if (!*args)
1688  return false;
1689 
1690  char const* id = handler->extractKeyFromLink((char*)args, "Hitemset"); // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hitemset:itemset_id|h[name]|h|r
1691  if (!id)
1692  return false;
1693 
1694  uint32 itemSetId = atol(id);
1695 
1696  // prevent generation all items with itemset field value '0'
1697  if (itemSetId == 0)
1698  {
1699  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_NO_ITEMS_FROM_ITEMSET_FOUND, itemSetId);
1700  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1701  return false;
1702  }
1703 
1704  Player* player = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer();
1705  Player* playerTarget = handler->getSelectedPlayer();
1706  if (!playerTarget)
1707  playerTarget = player;
1708 
1709  bool found = false;
1710  ItemTemplateContainer const* its = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplateStore();
1711  for (ItemTemplateContainer::const_iterator itr = its->begin(); itr != its->end(); ++itr)
1712  {
1713  if (itr->second.ItemSet == itemSetId)
1714  {
1715  found = true;
1716  ItemPosCountVec dest;
1717  InventoryResult msg = playerTarget->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, itr->second.ItemId, 1);
1718  if (msg == EQUIP_ERR_OK)
1719  {
1720  Item* item = playerTarget->StoreNewItem(dest, itr->second.ItemId, true);
1721 
1722  // remove binding (let GM give it to another player later)
1723  if (player == playerTarget)
1724  item->SetBinding(false);
1725 
1726  player->SendNewItem(item, 1, false, true);
1727  if (player != playerTarget)
1728  playerTarget->SendNewItem(item, 1, true, false);
1729  }
1730  else
1731  {
1732  player->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, itr->second.ItemId);
1733  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_ITEM_CANNOT_CREATE, itr->second.ItemId, 1);
1734  }
1735  }
1736  }
1737 
1738  if (!found)
1739  {
1740  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_NO_ITEMS_FROM_ITEMSET_FOUND, itemSetId);
1741  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1742  return false;
1743  }
1744 
1745  return true;
1746  }

1748  static bool HandleChangeWeather(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1749  {

1751  return false;

1755  {
1756  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_WEATHER_DISABLED);
1757  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1758  return false;
1759  }
1760 
1761  // *Change the weather of a cell
1762  char const* px = strtok((char*)args, " ");
1763  char const* py = strtok(nullptr, " ");
1764 
1765  if (!px || !py)
1766  return false;
1767 
1768  uint32 type = uint32(atoi(px)); //0 to 3, 0: fine, 1: rain, 2: snow, 3: sand
1769  float grade = float(atof(py)); //0 to 1, sending -1 is instand good weather
1770 
1771  Player* player = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer();

1773 
1774  Weather* weather = WeatherMgr::FindWeather(zoneid);
1775

1778  if (!weather)
1779  {
1780  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_WEATHER);
1781  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1782  return false;
1783  }
1784 
1785  weather->SetWeather(WeatherType(type), grade);
1786 
1787  return true;
1788  }

1793  if (!SelectedPlayer)
1794  {
1795  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
1796  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1797  return false;

1800  // each skills that have max skill value dependent from level seted to current level max skill value

1805  static bool HandleSetSkillCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1806  {
1807  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hskill:skill_id|h[name]|h|r
1808  char const* skillStr = handler->extractKeyFromLink((char*)args, "Hskill");
1809  if (!skillStr)
1810  return false;
1811 
1812  char const* levelStr = strtok(nullptr, " ");
1813  if (!levelStr)
1814  return false;
1815 
1816  char const* maxPureSkill = strtok(nullptr, " ");
1817 
1818  int32 skill = atoi(skillStr);
1819  if (skill <= 0)
1820  {
1821  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_INVALID_SKILL_ID, skill);
1822  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1823  return false;
1824  }
1825 
1826  int32 level = uint32(atol(levelStr));
1827 
1828  Player* target = handler->getSelectedPlayer();
1829  if (!target)
1830  {
1831  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
1832  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1833  return false;
1834  }
1835 
1836  SkillLineEntry const* skillLine = sSkillLineStore.LookupEntry(skill);
1837  if (!skillLine)
1838  {
1839  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_INVALID_SKILL_ID, skill);
1840  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1841  return false;
1842  }
1843 
1844  bool targetHasSkill = target->GetSkillValue(skill);
1845 
1846  // If our target does not yet have the skill they are trying to add to them, the chosen level also becomes
1847  // the max level of the new profession.
1848  uint16 max = maxPureSkill ? atol (maxPureSkill) : targetHasSkill ? target->GetPureMaxSkillValue(skill) : uint16(level);
1849 
1850  if (level <= 0 || level > max || max <= 0)
1851  return false;
1852 
1853  // If the player has the skill, we get the current skill step. If they don't have the skill, we
1854  // add the skill to the player's book with step 1 (which is the first rank, in most cases something
1855  // like 'Apprentice <skill>'.
1856  target->SetSkill(skill, targetHasSkill ? target->GetSkillStep(skill) : 1, level, max);
1857  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_SET_SKILL, skill, skillLine->name[handler->GetSessionDbcLocale()], handler->GetNameLink(target).c_str(), level, max);
1858  return true;
1859  }
1860 
1861  // show info of player
1862  static bool HandlePInfoCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
1863  {
1864  Player* target;
1865  ObjectGuid targetGuid;
1866  std::string targetName;
1867  CharacterDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = nullptr;
1868  LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* loginStmt = nullptr;
1869 
1870  ObjectGuid parseGUID = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::Player>(atol((char*)args));
1871 
1872  if (sObjectMgr->GetPlayerNameByGUID(parseGUID.GetCounter(), targetName))
1873  {
1874  target = ObjectAccessor::FindConnectedPlayer(parseGUID);
1875  targetGuid = parseGUID;
1876  }
1877  else if (!handler->extractPlayerTarget((char*)args, &target, &targetGuid, &targetName))
1878  return false;
1879 
1880  // Account data print variables
1881  std::string userName = handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_ERROR);
1882  ObjectGuid::LowType lowguid = targetGuid.GetCounter();
1883  uint32 accId = 0;
1884  std::string eMail = handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_ERROR);
1885  std::string regMail = handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_ERROR);
1886  uint32 security = 0;
1887  std::string lastIp = handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_ERROR);
1888  uint8 locked = 0;
1889  std::string lastLogin = handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_ERROR);
1890  uint32 failedLogins = 0;

2271  static bool HandleRespawnCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* /*args*/)
2272  {
2273  Player* player = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer();
2274 
2275  // accept only explicitly selected target (not implicitly self targeting case)
2276  Unit* target = handler->getSelectedUnit();
2277  if (player->GetTarget() && target)
2278  {
2279  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || target->IsPet())
2280  {
2281  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
2282  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2283  return false;
2284  }
2285 
2286  if (target->isDead())
2287  target->ToCreature()->Respawn();
2288  return true;
2289  }
2290 
2291  CellCoord p(Acore::ComputeCellCoord(player->GetPositionX(), player->GetPositionY()));
2292  Cell cell(p);
2293  cell.SetNoCreate();
2294 
2295  Acore::RespawnDo u_do;
2296  Acore::WorldObjectWorker<Acore::RespawnDo> worker(player, u_do);
2297  Cell::VisitGridObjects(player, worker, player->GetGridActivationRange());
2298 
2299  return true;
2300  }
2301  // mute player for some times
2302  static bool HandleMuteCommand(ChatHandler* handler, Optional<PlayerIdentifier> player, uint32 notSpeakTime, Tail muteReason)
2303  {
2304  std::string muteReasonStr{ muteReason };
2305 
2306  if (muteReason.empty())
2307  muteReasonStr = handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_NO_REASON);
2308 
2309  if (!player)
2310  player = PlayerIdentifier::FromTarget(handler);
2311 
2312  if (!player)
2313  {
2314  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
2315  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2316  return false;
2317  }
2318 
2319  Player* target = player->GetConnectedPlayer();
2320  uint32 accountId = target ? target->GetSession()->GetAccountId() : sObjectMgr->GetPlayerAccountIdByGUID(player->GetGUID().GetCounter());
2321 
2322  // find only player from same account if any
2323  if (!target)
2324  if (WorldSession* session = sWorld->FindSession(accountId))
2325  target = session->GetPlayer();
2326 
2327  // must have strong lesser security level
2328  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(target, player->GetGUID(), true))
2329  return false;
2330 
2331  LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_UPD_MUTE_TIME);
2332  std::string muteBy = "";
2333  if (handler->GetSession())
2334  muteBy = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayerName();
2335  else
2336  muteBy = handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_CONSOLE);
2337 
2338  if (target)
2339  {
2340  // Target is online, mute will be in effect right away.
2341  int64 muteTime = time(nullptr) + notSpeakTime * MINUTE;
2342  target->GetSession()->m_muteTime = muteTime;
2343  stmt->setInt64(0, muteTime);
2344  std::string nameLink = handler->playerLink(player->GetName());
2345 
2346  if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_SHOW_MUTE_IN_WORLD))
2347  sWorld->SendWorldText(LANG_COMMAND_MUTEMESSAGE_WORLD, muteBy.c_str(), nameLink.c_str(), notSpeakTime, muteReasonStr.c_str());
2348 
2349  ChatHandler(target->GetSession()).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOUR_CHAT_DISABLED, notSpeakTime, muteBy.c_str(), muteReasonStr.c_str());
2350  }
2351  else
2352  {
2353  // Target is offline, mute will be in effect starting from the next login.
2354  stmt->setInt32(0, -int32(notSpeakTime * MINUTE));
2355  }
2356 
2357  stmt->setString(1, muteReasonStr);
2358  stmt->setString(2, muteBy);
2359  stmt->setUInt32(3, accountId);
2360  LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2361 
2362  stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_INS_ACCOUNT_MUTE);
2363  stmt->setUInt32(0, accountId);
2364  stmt->setUInt32(1, notSpeakTime);
2365  stmt->setString(2, muteBy);
2366  stmt->setString(3, muteReasonStr);
2367  LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2368 
2369  std::string nameLink = handler->playerLink(player->GetName());
2370 
2371  if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_SHOW_MUTE_IN_WORLD) && !target)
2372  sWorld->SendWorldText(LANG_COMMAND_MUTEMESSAGE_WORLD, muteBy.c_str(), nameLink.c_str(), notSpeakTime, muteReasonStr.c_str());
2373  else
2374  {
2375  // pussywizard: notify all online GMs
2376  std::shared_lock<std::shared_mutex> lock(*HashMapHolder<Player>::GetLock());
2377  HashMapHolder<Player>::MapType const& m = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayers();
2378  for (HashMapHolder<Player>::MapType::const_iterator itr = m.begin(); itr != m.end(); ++itr)
2379  if (itr->second->GetSession()->GetSecurity())
2380  ChatHandler(itr->second->GetSession()).PSendSysMessage(target ? LANG_YOU_DISABLE_CHAT : LANG_COMMAND_DISABLE_CHAT_DELAYED,
2381  (handler->GetSession() ? handler->GetSession()->GetPlayerName().c_str() : handler->GetAcoreString(LANG_CONSOLE)), nameLink.c_str(), notSpeakTime, muteReasonStr.c_str());
2382  }
2383 
2384  return true;
2385  }

2387  // unmute player
2388  static bool HandleUnmuteCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
2389  {
2390  Player* target;
2391  ObjectGuid targetGuid;
2392  std::string targetName;
2393  if (!handler->extractPlayerTarget((char*)args, &target, &targetGuid, &targetName))
2394  return false;
2395 
2396  uint32 accountId = target ? target->GetSession()->GetAccountId() : sObjectMgr->GetPlayerAccountIdByGUID(targetGuid.GetCounter());
2397 
2398  // find only player from same account if any
2399  if (!target)
2400  if (WorldSession* session = sWorld->FindSession(accountId))
2401  target = session->GetPlayer();
2402 
2403  // must have strong lesser security level
2404  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity (target, targetGuid, true))
2405  return false;
2406 
2407  if (target)
2408  {
2409  if (target->CanSpeak())
2410  {
2411  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_CHAT_ALREADY_ENABLED);
2412  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2413  return false;
2414  }
2415 
2416  target->GetSession()->m_muteTime = 0;
2417  }
2418 
2419  LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_UPD_MUTE_TIME);
2420  stmt->setInt64(0, 0);
2421  stmt->setString(1, "");
2422  stmt->setString(2, "");
2423  stmt->setUInt32(3, accountId);
2424  LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2425 
2426  if (target)
2427  ChatHandler(target->GetSession()).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOUR_CHAT_ENABLED);
2428 
2429  std::string nameLink = handler->playerLink(targetName);
2430 
2431  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_ENABLE_CHAT, nameLink.c_str());
2432 
2433  return true;
2434  }

2436  // mutehistory command
2437  static bool HandleMuteInfoCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
2438  {
2439  if (!*args)
2440  return false;
2441 
2442  char* nameStr = strtok((char*)args, "");
2443  if (!nameStr)
2444  return false;
2445 
2446  std::string accountName = nameStr;
2447  if (!Utf8ToUpperOnlyLatin(accountName))
2448  {
2449  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST, accountName.c_str());
2450  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2451  return false;
2452  }
2453 
2454  uint32 accountId = AccountMgr::GetId(accountName);
2455  if (!accountId)
2456  {
2457  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST, accountName.c_str());
2458  return false;
2459  }
2460 
2461  return HandleMuteInfoHelper(accountId, accountName.c_str(), handler);
2462  }
2463 
2464  // helper for mutehistory
2465  static bool HandleMuteInfoHelper(uint32 accountId, char const* accountName, ChatHandler* handler)
2466  {
2467  LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_SEL_ACCOUNT_MUTE_INFO);
2468  stmt->setUInt16(0, accountId);
2469  PreparedQueryResult result = LoginDatabase.Query(stmt);
2470 
2471  if (!result)
2472  {
2473  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_MUTEHISTORY_EMPTY, accountName);
2474  return true;
2475  }
2476 
2477  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_MUTEHISTORY, accountName);
2478  do
2479  {
2480  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2481 
2482  // we have to manually set the string for mutedate
2483  time_t sqlTime = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2484  tm timeInfo;
2485  char buffer[80];
2486 
2487  // set it to string
2488  localtime_r(&sqlTime, &timeInfo);
2489  strftime(buffer, sizeof(buffer), "%Y-%m-%d %I:%M%p", &timeInfo);
2490 
2491  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_MUTEHISTORY_OUTPUT, buffer, fields[1].GetUInt32(), fields[2].GetCString(), fields[3].GetCString());
2492  } while (result->NextRow());
2493  return true;
2494  }

2496  static bool HandleMovegensCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* /*args*/)
2497  {
2498  Unit* unit = handler->getSelectedUnit();
2499  if (!unit)
2500  {
2501  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
2502  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2503  return false;
2504  }
2505 
2506  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_LIST, (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? "Player" : "Creature"), unit->GetGUID().GetCounter());
2507 
2508  MotionMaster* motionMaster = unit->GetMotionMaster();
2509  float x, y, z;
2510  motionMaster->GetDestination(x, y, z);
2511 
2512  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_MOTION_SLOT; ++i)
2513  {
2514  MovementGenerator* movementGenerator = motionMaster->GetMotionSlot(i);
2515  if (!movementGenerator)
2516  {
2517  handler->SendSysMessage("Empty");
2518  continue;
2519  }
2520 
2521  switch (movementGenerator->GetMovementGeneratorType())
2522  {
2523  case IDLE_MOTION_TYPE:
2524  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_IDLE);
2525  break;
2526  case RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE:
2527  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_RANDOM);
2528  break;
2529  case WAYPOINT_MOTION_TYPE:
2530  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_WAYPOINT);
2531  break;
2532  case ANIMAL_RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE:
2533  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_ANIMAL_RANDOM);
2534  break;
2535  case CONFUSED_MOTION_TYPE:
2536  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_CONFUSED);
2537  break;
2538  case CHASE_MOTION_TYPE:
2539  {
2540  Unit* target = nullptr;
2541  if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2542  target = static_cast<ChaseMovementGenerator<Player> const*>(movementGenerator)->GetTarget();
2543  else
2544  target = static_cast<ChaseMovementGenerator<Creature> const*>(movementGenerator)->GetTarget();
2545 
2546  if (!target)
2547  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_CHASE_NULL);
2548  else if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2549  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_CHASE_PLAYER, target->GetName().c_str(), target->GetGUID().GetCounter());
2550  else
2551  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_CHASE_CREATURE, target->GetName().c_str(), target->GetGUID().GetCounter());
2552  break;
2553  }
2554  case FOLLOW_MOTION_TYPE:
2555  {
2556  Unit* target = nullptr;
2557  if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2558  target = static_cast<FollowMovementGenerator<Player> const*>(movementGenerator)->GetTarget();
2559  else
2560  target = static_cast<FollowMovementGenerator<Creature> const*>(movementGenerator)->GetTarget();
2561 
2562  if (!target)
2563  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FOLLOW_NULL);
2564  else if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2565  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FOLLOW_PLAYER, target->GetName().c_str(), target->GetGUID().GetCounter());
2566  else
2567  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FOLLOW_CREATURE, target->GetName().c_str(), target->GetGUID().GetCounter());
2568  break;
2569  }
2570  case HOME_MOTION_TYPE:
2571  {
2572  if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2573  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_HOME_CREATURE, x, y, z);
2574  else
2575  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_HOME_PLAYER);
2576  break;
2577  }
2578  case FLIGHT_MOTION_TYPE:
2579  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FLIGHT);
2580  break;
2581  case POINT_MOTION_TYPE:
2582  {
2583  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_POINT, x, y, z);
2584  break;
2585  }
2586  case FLEEING_MOTION_TYPE:
2587  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_FEAR);
2588  break;
2589  case DISTRACT_MOTION_TYPE:
2590  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_DISTRACT);
2591  break;
2592  case EFFECT_MOTION_TYPE:
2593  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_EFFECT);
2594  break;
2595  default:
2596  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVEGENS_UNKNOWN, movementGenerator->GetMovementGeneratorType());
2597  break;
2598  }
2599  }
2600  return true;
2601  }

2603  ComeToMe command REQUIRED for 3rd party scripting library to have access to PointMovementGenerator
2604  Without this function 3rd party scripting library will get linking errors (unresolved external)
2605  when attempting to use the PointMovementGenerator
2606  */

2628  static bool HandleDamageCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
2629  {
2630  if (!*args)
2631  return false;
2632

2634  if (!target || !handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetTarget())
2635  {
2636  handler->SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CHAR_OR_CREATURE);
2637  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2638  return false;
2639  }
2640 
2641  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2642  {
2643  if (handler->HasLowerSecurity(target->ToPlayer()))
2644  return false;
2645  }
2646

2648  return true;

2650  int32 damage_int = atoi(args);

2652  return true;

2655

2657  target->ToCreature()->LowerPlayerDamageReq(target->GetMaxHealth());
2658  Unit::DealDamage(handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer(), target, damage, nullptr, DIRECT_DAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false, true);
2659  if (target != handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer())
2660  handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->SendAttackStateUpdate (HITINFO_AFFECTS_VICTIM, target, 1, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, damage, 0, 0, VICTIMSTATE_HIT, 0);
2661  return true;
2662  }

2720  // Send mail by command
2721  static bool HandleSendMailCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
2722  {
2723  // format: name "subject text" "mail text"
2724  Player* target;
2725  ObjectGuid targetGuid;
2726  std::string targetName;
2727  if (!handler->extractPlayerTarget((char*)args, &target, &targetGuid, &targetName))
2728  return false;
2729 
2730  char* tail1 = strtok(nullptr, "");
2731  if (!tail1)
2732  return false;
2733 
2734  char const* msgSubject = handler->extractQuotedArg(tail1);
2735  if (!msgSubject)
2736  return false;
2737 
2738  char* tail2 = strtok(nullptr, "");
2739  if (!tail2)
2740  return false;
2741 
2742  char const* msgText = handler->extractQuotedArg(tail2);
2743  if (!msgText)
2744  return false;
2745 
2746  // msgSubject, msgText isn't NUL after prev. check
2747  std::string subject = msgSubject;
2748  std::string text = msgText;
2749 
2750  ObjectGuid::LowType senderGuid;
2751  // If the message is sent from console, set it as sent by the target itself, like the other Customer Support mails.
2752  senderGuid = handler->GetSession() ? handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGUID().GetCounter() : targetGuid.GetCounter();
2753  MailSender sender(MAIL_NORMAL, senderGuid, MAIL_STATIONERY_GM);
2754 
2755  //- TODO: Fix poor design
2756  CharacterDatabaseTransaction trans = CharacterDatabase.BeginTransaction();
2757  MailDraft(subject, text)
2758  .SendMailTo(trans, MailReceiver(target, targetGuid.GetCounter()), sender);
2759 
2760  CharacterDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
2761 
2762  std::string nameLink = handler->playerLink(targetName);
2763  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MAIL_SENT, nameLink.c_str());
2764  return true;
2765  }
2766  // Send items by mail
2767  static bool HandleSendItemsCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)
2768  {
2769  // format: name "subject text" "mail text" item1[:count1] item2[:count2] ... item12[:count12]
2770  Player* receiver;
2771  ObjectGuid receiverGuid;
2772  std::string receiverName;
2773  if (!handler->extractPlayerTarget((char*)args, &receiver, &receiverGuid, &receiverName))
2774  return false;
2775 
2776  char* tail1 = strtok(nullptr, "");
2777  if (!tail1)
2778  return false;
2779 
2780  char const* msgSubject = handler->extractQuotedArg(tail1);
2781  if (!msgSubject)
2782  return false;
2783 
2784  char* tail2 = strtok(nullptr, "");
2785  if (!tail2)
2786  return false;
2787 
2788  char const* msgText = handler->extractQuotedArg(tail2);
2789  if (!msgText)
2790  return false;
2791 
2792  // msgSubject, msgText isn't NUL after prev. check
2793  std::string subject = msgSubject;
2794  std::string text = msgText;
2795 
2796  // extract items
2797  typedef std::pair<uint32, uint32> ItemPair;
2798  typedef std::list< ItemPair > ItemPairs;
2799  ItemPairs items;
2800 
2801  // get all tail string
2802  char* tail = strtok(nullptr, "");
2803 
2804  // get from tail next item str
2805  while (char* itemStr = strtok(tail, " "))
2806  {
2807  // and get new tail
2808  tail = strtok(nullptr, "");
2809 
2810  // parse item str
2811  char const* itemIdStr = strtok(itemStr, ":");
2812  char const* itemCountStr = strtok(nullptr, " ");
2813 
2814  uint32 itemId = atoi(itemIdStr);
2815  if (!itemId)
2816  return false;
2817 
2818  ItemTemplate const* item_proto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(itemId);
2819  if (!item_proto)
2820  {
2821  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ITEMIDINVALID, itemId);
2822  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2823  return false;
2824  }
2825 
2826  uint32 itemCount = itemCountStr ? atoi(itemCountStr) : 1;
2827  if (itemCount < 1 || (item_proto->MaxCount > 0 && itemCount > uint32(item_proto->MaxCount)))
2828  {
2829  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_INVALID_ITEM_COUNT, itemCount, itemId);
2830  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2831  return false;
2832  }
2833 
2834  while (itemCount > item_proto->GetMaxStackSize())
2835  {
2836  items.push_back(ItemPair(itemId, item_proto->GetMaxStackSize()));
2837  itemCount -= item_proto->GetMaxStackSize();
2838  }
2839 
2840  items.push_back(ItemPair(itemId, itemCount));
2841 
2842  if (items.size() > MAX_MAIL_ITEMS)
2843  {
2844  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_MAIL_ITEMS_LIMIT, MAX_MAIL_ITEMS);
2845  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2846  return false;
2847  }
2848  }
2849 
2850  ObjectGuid::LowType senderGuid;
2851  // If the message is sent from console, set it as sent by the target itself, like the other Customer Support mails.
2852  senderGuid = handler->GetSession() ? handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer()->GetGUID().GetCounter() : receiverGuid.GetCounter();
2853  MailSender sender(MAIL_NORMAL, senderGuid, MAIL_STATIONERY_GM);
2854 
2855  // fill mail
2856  MailDraft draft(subject, text);
2857 
2858  CharacterDatabaseTransaction trans = CharacterDatabase.BeginTransaction();
2859 
2860  for (ItemPairs::const_iterator itr = items.begin(); itr != items.end(); ++itr)
2861  {
2862  if (Item* item = Item::CreateItem(itr->first, itr->second, handler->GetSession() ? handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer() : 0))
2863  {
2864  item->SaveToDB(trans); // save for prevent lost at next mail load, if send fail then item will deleted
2865  draft.AddItem(item);
2866  }
2867  }
2868 
2869  draft.SendMailTo(trans, MailReceiver(receiver, receiverGuid.GetCounter()), sender);
2870  CharacterDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
2871 
2872  std::string nameLink = handler->playerLink(receiverName);
2873  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_MAIL_SENT, nameLink.c_str());
2874  return true;
2875  }

2954  static bool HandleCreatePetCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* /*args*/)
2955  {
2956  Player* player = handler->GetSession()->GetPlayer();
2957  Creature* creatureTarget = handler->getSelectedCreature();
2958 
2959  if (!creatureTarget || creatureTarget->IsPet() || creatureTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2960  {
2961  handler->PSendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
2962  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2963  return false;
2964  }
2965 
2966  CreatureTemplate const* creatrueTemplate = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(creatureTarget->GetEntry());
2967  // Creatures with family 0 crashes the server
2968  if (!creatrueTemplate->family)
2969  {
2970  handler->PSendSysMessage("This creature cannot be tamed. (family id: 0).");
2971  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2972  return false;
2973  }
2974 
2975  if (player->GetPetGUID())
2976  {
2977  handler->PSendSysMessage("You already have a pet");
2978  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2979  return false;
2980  }
2981 
2982  // Everything looks OK, create new pet
2983  Pet* pet = new Pet(player, HUNTER_PET);
2984  if (!pet->CreateBaseAtCreature(creatureTarget))
2985  {
2986  delete pet;
2987  handler->PSendSysMessage("Error 1");
2988  return false;
2989  }
2990 
2991  creatureTarget->setDeathState(JUST_DIED);
2992  creatureTarget->RemoveCorpse();
2993  creatureTarget->SetHealth(0); // just for nice GM-mode view
2994 
2995  pet->SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_CREATEDBY, player->GetGUID());
2996  pet->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FACTIONTEMPLATE, player->GetFaction());
2997 
2998  if (!pet->InitStatsForLevel(creatureTarget->getLevel()))
2999  {
3000  LOG_ERROR("misc", "InitStatsForLevel() in EffectTameCreature failed! Pet deleted.");
3001  handler->PSendSysMessage("Error 2");
3002  delete pet;
3003  return false;
3004  }
3005 
3006  // prepare visual effect for levelup
3007  pet->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_LEVEL, creatureTarget->getLevel() - 1);
3008 
3009  pet->GetCharmInfo()->SetPetNumber(sObjectMgr->GeneratePetNumber(), true);
3010  // this enables pet details window (Shift+P)
3011  pet->InitPetCreateSpells();
3012  pet->SetFullHealth();
3013 
3014  pet->GetMap()->AddToMap(pet->ToCreature());
3015 
3016  // visual effect for levelup
3017  pet->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_LEVEL, creatureTarget->getLevel());
3018 
3019  player->SetMinion(pet, true);
3020  pet->SavePetToDB(PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT, false);
3021  player->PetSpellInitialize();
3022 
3023  return true;
3024  }

3026  static bool HandlePetLearnCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)

3037  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3038  return false;

3066  return false;

3073  handler->SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3074  return false;
3075  }
3076 
3077  pet->learnSpell(spellId);
3078 
3079  handler->PSendSysMessage("Pet has learned spell %u", spellId);
3080  return true;

3107  static bool HandleFreezeCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)

3110  Unit* target = handler->getSelectedUnit();

3527  static bool HandleBagsClearCommand(ChatHandler* handler, char const* args)

3600  str << "all";
3601  }

3632  static bool HandleInventoryCountCommand(ChatHandler* handler, Optional<PlayerIdentifier> player)

3656  for (uint8 slot = INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_START; slot < INVENTORY_SLOT_ITEM_END; ++slot)

3689  bool initialize = true;
3690  for (uint8 i = ITEM_SUBCLASS_CONTAINER; i < MAX_ITEM_SUBCLASS_CONTAINER; ++i)

3704  initialize = false;
3705  }
3706  }
3707  }
3708  else
